com.bot.worker.taskmanager

Class TaskContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bot.worker.taskmanager.TaskContext

  • class TaskContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for task configuration and execution info

    Contains next data

    • TaskConfig
    • Group name
    • Task execution Future
    • Last TaskResult
    • TaskStatus
    Author:
    Aleks
